awards.text: Nominated for 2 Golden Globes. Another 13 wins & 5 nominations.

fullplot: Epic tale of a group of Jewish gangsters in New York, from childhood, through their glory years during prohibition, and their meeting again 35 years later.
plot: A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to the Lower East Side of Manhattan over thirty years later, where he once again must confront the ghosts and regrets of his old life.
title: Once Upon a Time in America
